thread.title: AV Concepts and Cadence Launch New Special Events Venue in San Diego
thread.title_full: AV Concepts and Cadence Launch New Special Events Venue in San Diego - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: AV Concepts and Cadence Launch New Special Events Venue in San Diego
text:
AV Concepts and Cadence Travel have teamed up to present a stylish new 20,000-sf industrial meeting and event space in Southern California, just in time for the holidays.
San Diego, CA
AV Concepts, a leader in creative and technical event solutions, and Cadence Travel Management, are thrilled to join forces to present a flexible new Southern California meeting and event venue.
The San Diego Creative Space offers a stylish, 20,000-sf industrial venue featuring the world’s largest holographic theatre, several themed event areas, five-star kitchen amenities, 15-ft-tall open spaces and unique audio-visual experiences.
“The creative potential of this space is exactly what San Diego needs right now,” said Don Jones, Executive Vice President of Sales & Marketing at Cadence. “We couldn’t be more excited to partner with AV Concepts because we share the same vision for creating meaningful events that turn guests into engaged participants.”
One of the hottest new venues in town, the San Diego Creative Space has the capacity to fit any event need – from large company-wide receptions to smaller executive meetings. The venue has multiple interior spaces that can be themed for events including The Hipster Lounge, Virtual Zone, Big Idea Room, Fiesta Deck and the Serenity Garden.
“What makes the San Diego Creative Space so unique is that it’s the home of AV Concepts’ San Diego Center for Innovation,” explained David Deal, Director of Marketing at AV Concepts. “We partner with some of the world’s most innovative brands on the technical and creative elements of their events. So when you book the San Diego Creative Space, you’re getting an AV partner who can help you create an unforgettable experience for your guests.”
Minimum rentals start from $3,500 - $8,700 for full venue buyouts. Visit http://www.sandiegocreativespace.com to learn more, or contact Anna Nelson at 858-551-6979 or via email at sdcreativespace(at)cadencetravel(dot)com for inquiries.
About AV Concepts:
AV Concepts partners with brands, their experiential marketing agencies, and production partners to deliver creative and technical event solutions. We offer a collaborative, in-house approach for general sessions, keynote productions and experiential marketing activations including creative, engineering, technology and staging. From intimate events to large user conferences, we grow and evolve with our clients as their needs adapt and change. And we’re always pushing the envelope, leveraging new technologies, or inventing our own, to ensure we’re creating immersive experiences that dazzle audiences and drive business results. Visit http://www.avconcepts.com to learn how we can partner with you on your next event, follow us on Twitter @avconceptsinc or connect with us on LinkedIn .
